title: The Mesh

knows: Malmö operates a city-wide infrastructure mesh network connecting all smart buildings and services
Buildings, traffic systems, public services, libraries all share data through common layer
Data sharing is 'legal' through resident agreements Section 8.4 and 11.2
Anonymization is effectively fiction when combining multiple data sources
Lena consulted on the original mesh pilot program 5 years ago
The mesh responds to non-compliance within 2-3 hours through coordinated systems
Building uploaded data to city hub 7 minutes after she returned from library
Her complete digital profile is visible across 13+ connected systems
~50 cities globally have similar integrated systems, number growing
The coordination is architectural/systemic, not conspiratorial
Most compliant residents never see the coercive side of the system
Resistance is fragmented by design - each resister thinks problems are unique
Escape requires leaving smart cities entirely, but they're spreading
